name: optional-date-time-pattern
description: Represents an optional BACnet date-time pattern, allowing either null or a date-time-pattern value.

options.name: null
options.description: Indicates the absence of a date-time pattern value.

options.name: datetimepattern
options.description: Specifies the BACnet date-time pattern value when present.
